text: "Day After Day" is a 1971 song by Welsh rock band Badfinger. It is from their fourth studio album Straight Up. It went number 2 in Canada, number 3 in New Zealand, number 4 in the United States, number 6 in Australia, number 10 in the United Kingdom and number 13 in Ireland. ==References== Category:1971 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Badfinger songs Category:Rod Stewart songs Category:Engelbert Humperdinck songs
title: Day After Day (Badfinger song)
